• VXLIB Function Reference
Phase

OpenVX Function Description

  • Implements the Gradient Phase Computation Kernel.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/db/d4e/group__group__vision__function__phase.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_phase_i16s_i16s_o8u : Input image is S16 format and output image is U8 format
